thread.title: Why Is Donald Trump So Effective?
thread.title_full: Why Is Donald Trump So Effective?

author: Entrepreneur Network
title: Why Is Donald Trump So Effective?
text:
Efficiency Why Is Donald Trump So Effective? Whether or not you agree with his policies, there's no denying that Trump has done some remarkable things. Premium video network providing entertainment and education from successful entrepreneurs and thought leaders   
On this episode, Entrepreneur Network partner Stone Jordan breaks down the top reason that Donald Trump has been able to rebound from bankruptcy and overcome overwhelming odds to become the 45th president: He doesn't listen to people who say he can't. 
Watch the video to learn more about how Trump's self-belief has fueled his greatest successes. 
Watch more great interviews on Business Rockstar's YouTube channel.
